title: TURKEY TACO SALAD
directions: In a large nonstick skillet, cook turkey over medium heat until meat is no longer pink
Stir in tomatoes and seasonings and heat through
Top lettuce with turkey mixture and shredded cheese
Optional-add light sour cream, diced avocados, and black beans (and/or toppings of your choice)
Optional-put turkey mixture and toppings in a tortilla to make a taco
ingredients: 1 can (14 1/2 oz) diced tomatoes, undrained (I used diced tomatoes with basil, garlic, and oregano)
optional-shredded lettuce, diced avocado, light sour cream, black beans (drained)
